packages.description:
## Package Overview

This package provides a function to transform the XML content to another XML/HTML/plain text using XSL transformations.

For information on the operations, which you can perform with this module, see the below **Functions**. For examples on the usage of the operations, see the [XSLT Transformation Example](https://ballerina.io/learn/by-example/xslt-transformation.html).

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: An XML object, which needs to be transformed

parameters.name: xsl
parameters.description: The XSL style sheet represented in an XML object

returnParameters.description:
The transformed result represented in an XML object or else an `error` if the given `XML` object
           can't be transformed

functions.name: transform
functions.description:
Transforms the single-rooted XML content to another XML/HTML/plain text using XSL transformations.
```ballerina
# xml|error target = xslt:transform(sourceXml, xsl);
# ```

errors.name: TransformError
errors.description: Represents a `TransformError` with the message and the cause.

packages.name: xslt
packages.summary: This package provides a function to transform the XML content to another XML/HTML/plain text using XSL transformations.
